author: Aimee cote
blog3.title: Beyond Behaviors: An innovative approach to challenging behavior
blog3.content: Here is a link to a presentation I recently gave on #BeyondBehaviors. We now understand so much about how the brain and body work together to respond to safety vs danger. From my perspective, this approach to challenging behavior from Mona Delahooke, Ph.D. is the most aligned with this understanding.
